00015 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00016 // FPGA I/O
00017 #define FPGA_RESET              AT91C_PIO_PA7      // Output
00018 #define FPGA_A0                 AT91C_PIO_PA24     // Output
00019 #define FPGA_A1                 AT91C_PIO_PA25     // Output
00020 #define FPGA_A2                 AT91C_PIO_PA26     // Output
00021 #define FPGA_RDn                AT91C_PIO_PA27     // Output
00022 #define FPGA_WRn                AT91C_PIO_PA28     // Output
00023 
00024 #define FPGA_INTn               AT91C_PIO_PA20     // Input
00025 
00026 #define FPGA_D0                 AT91C_PIO_PA8      // Input/Output
00027 #define FPGA_D1                 AT91C_PIO_PA9      // Input/Output
00028 #define FPGA_D2                 AT91C_PIO_PA10     // Input/Output
00029 #define FPGA_D3                 AT91C_PIO_PA11     // Input/Output
00030 #define FPGA_D4                 AT91C_PIO_PA12     // Input/Output
00031 #define FPGA_D5                 AT91C_PIO_PA13     // Input/Output
00032 #define FPGA_D6                 AT91C_PIO_PA14     // Input/Output
00033 #define FPGA_D7                 AT91C_PIO_PA15     // Input/Output
00034 
00035 #define FPGA_DATA \
00036     ( FPGA_D0 | FPGA_D1 | FPGA_D2 | FPGA_D3 \
00037     | FPGA_D4 | FPGA_D5 | FPGA_D6 | FPGA_D7 )
00038 
00039 #define FPGA_ADDR \
00040     ( FPGA_A0 | FPGA_A1 | FPGA_A2 )
00041 
00042 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00043 enum // FPGA Read registers
00044 {
00045     // Page independent
00046     XPI_R_INT_REQUEST          = 0, // D5..0: CTXE, PCM, EIRQ, CRX, CTX, FC
00047     // Page 0
00048     XPI_R_P0_SC_CTX            = 1, // D7..0= CTX data
00049     XPI_R_P0_SC_CRX            = 2, // D7..0= CRX data
00050     XPI_R_P0_SC_EIRQ           = 3, // D0= EIRQ
00051     XPI_R_P0_FC_FDFA           = 4, // D5= FCA5 .. D2= FCA0, D1= FCD1, D0= FCD0
00052     XPI_R_P0_FC_SENSE          = 5, // D0= SENSE
00053     XPI_R_P0_FC_STATUS         = 6, // D3= SENSE, D2= FCE, D1= FCD, D0= FCC
00054     XPI_R_P0_GLB_STATUS        = 7, // D1= EIRQ, D0= MCPU
00055     // Page 1
00056     XPI_R_P1_IRQ_ENABLE        = 1, // D5..0= CTXE, PCM, EIRQ, CRX, CTX, FC
00057     XPI_R_P1_MAGIC_LSB         = 4, // D7..0= '10101010' (0xAA)
00058     XPI_R_P1_MAGIC_MSB         = 5, // D7..0= '00010001' (0x11)
00059     XPI_R_P1_BOARD_POS         = 7, // D5..0= KA5..0
00060     // Page 2
00061     XPI_R_P2_PCM_ACK           = 0, // Dummy read (data should be ignored)
00062     XPI_R_P2_PCM_R0            = 4, // D7..0= PCM data
00063     XPI_R_P2_PCM_R1            = 5, // D7..0= PCM data
00064     XPI_R_P2_PCM_T0            = 6, // D7..0= PCM data
00065     XPI_R_P2_PCM_T1            = 7  // D7..0= PCM data
00066     };
00067 
00068 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00069 enum // FPGA Write registers
00070 {
00071     // Page independent
00072     XPI_W_PAGE_ADDR            = 0, // D1..0= A4..3
00073     // Page 0
00074     XPI_W_P0_IRQ_ENABLE        = 1, // D5..0= CTXE, PCM, EIRQ, CRX, CTX, FC
00075     XPI_W_P0_IRQ_DISABLE       = 2, // D5..0= CTXE, PCM, EIRQ, CRX, CTX, FC
00076     XPI_W_P0_LED_SET           = 3, // D2= LED_R, D1= LED_Y, D0= LED_G
00077     XPI_W_P0_LED_CLEAR         = 4, // D2= LED_R, D1= LED_Y, D0= LED_G
00078     XPI_W_P0_FC_CONTROL        = 5, // D2= FCE, D1= FCD, D0= FCC
00079     XPI_W_P0_GLB_CONTROL       = 7, // D0= MCPU
00080     // Page 1
00081     XPI_W_P1_SC_CTX_DATA       = 1, // D7..0= CTX data
00082     XPI_W_P1_SC_CTX_INCFIFO    = 2, // D7..0= ignored; inc FIFO & enable CTXE
00083     // Page 2
00084     XPI_W_P2_PCM_R0            = 4, // D5..0= PCM time slot
00085     XPI_W_P2_PCM_R1            = 5, // D5..0= PCM time slot
00086     XPI_W_P2_PCM_T0            = 6, // D5..0= PCM time slot
00087     XPI_W_P2_PCM_T1            = 7  // D5..0= PCM time slot
00088     };
00089 
00090 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00091 enum // FPGA Register Bitmap
00092 {
00093     XPI_IRQ_CTXE        = 0x20, // CTX empty
00094     XPI_IRQ_PCM         = 0x10, // PCM frame sync
00095     XPI_IRQ_EIRQ        = 0x08, // EIRQ changed event
00096     XPI_IRQ_CRX         = 0x04, // CRX data received event
00097     XPI_IRQ_CTX         = 0x02, // CTX data received event
00098     XPI_IRQ_FC          = 0x01, // FC data received event
00099     XPI_LED_R           = 0x04, // Red LED
00100     XPI_LED_Y           = 0x02, // Yellow LED
00101     XPI_LED_G           = 0x01, // Green LED
00102     XPI_FC_SENSE        = 0x08, // SENSE bit
00103     XPI_FC_FCE          = 0x04, // FCE bit
00104     XPI_FC_FCD          = 0x02, // FCD bit
00105     XPI_FC_FCC          = 0x01, // FCC bit
00106     XPI_GLB_MCPU        = 0x01, // MCPU bit
00107     XPI_GLB_EIRQ        = 0x02, // EIRQ bit
00108     XPI_GLB_MCTX_BUSY   = 0x04, // MCTX_BUSY bit
00109     };

00111 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00112 // FPGA I/O methods
00113 
00114 static inline void FPGA_BegWrite( void )
00115 {
00116     AT91F_PIO_OutputEnable( AT91C_BASE_PIOA, FPGA_DATA );
00117     }
00118 
00119 static inline void FPGA_BegRead( void )
00120 {
00121     AT91F_PIO_OutputDisable( AT91C_BASE_PIOA, FPGA_DATA );
00122     }
00123 
00124 static inline void FPGA_Write( uint addr, uint data )
00125 {
00126     AT91F_PIO_ForceOutput( AT91C_BASE_PIOA,
00127         FPGA_RDn | ( ( addr & 0x7 ) << 24 ) | ( ( data & 0xFF ) << 8 )
00128         );
00129 
00130     asm volatile( "NOP" );
00131 
00132     AT91F_PIO_SetOutput( AT91C_BASE_PIOA, FPGA_WRn );
00133     }
00134 
00135 static inline uint FPGA_Read( uint addr )
00136 {
00137     AT91F_PIO_ForceOutput( AT91C_BASE_PIOA,
00138         FPGA_WRn | ( ( addr & 0x7 ) << 24 )
00139         );
00140     
00141     asm volatile( "NOP" );
00142 
00143     uint data = ( AT91F_PIO_GetInput( AT91C_BASE_PIOA ) >> 8 ) & 0xFF;
00144 
00145     AT91F_PIO_SetOutput( AT91C_BASE_PIOA, FPGA_RDn );
00146 
00147     return data;
00148     }
00149 
00150 static inline void FPGA_SetReset( bool reset = true )
00151 {
00152     if ( reset )
00153         AT91F_PIO_SetOutput( AT91C_BASE_PIOA, FPGA_RESET );
00154     else
00155         AT91F_PIO_ClearOutput( AT91C_BASE_PIOA, FPGA_RESET );
00156     }
00157 
00158 static inline bool FPGA_IsReset( void )
00159 {
00160     return ISSET( AT91F_PIO_GetInput( AT91C_BASE_PIOA ), FPGA_RESET );
00161     }
00162 
00163 static inline void FPGA_PulseReset( void )
00164 {
00165     AT91F_PIO_SetOutput( AT91C_BASE_PIOA, FPGA_RESET );
00166     
00167     asm volatile( "NOP" );
00168 
00169     AT91F_PIO_ClearOutput( AT91C_BASE_PIOA, FPGA_RESET );
00170     }
